#### PR description:
Few minor modifications are added for SIM initialisation:
1) do not store full OscarMTProducer data set in the master thread RunManager.
2) moved dump of gdml geometry file to the first worker thread with sensitive detector mark attached to sensitive volumes.
3) improved few debug printouts

DO not expected any change in any WF.
